com.oracle.javafx.scenebuilder.kit.editor.panel.content

Class ContentPanelController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.oracle.javafx.scenebuilder.kit.editor.panel.util.AbstractPanelController
      • com.oracle.javafx.scenebuilder.kit.editor.panel.util.AbstractFxmlPanelController
        • com.oracle.javafx.scenebuilder.kit.editor.panel.content.ContentPanelController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.oracle.javafx.scenebuilder.kit.fxom.FXOMDocument.SceneGraphHolder

    public class ContentPanelController
extends com.oracle.javafx.scenebuilder.kit.editor.panel.util.AbstractFxmlPanelController
implements com.oracle.javafx.scenebuilder.kit.fxom.FXOMDocument.SceneGraphHolder
    This class creates and controls the Content Panel of Scene Builder Kit.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ContentPanelController(EditorController editorController)
      Creates a content panel controller for the specified editor controller.

      • pick

        public com.oracle.javafx.scenebuilder.kit.fxom.FXOMObject pick(double sceneX,
                                                               double sceneY)
        Returns the topmost FXOMObject at (sceneX, sceneY) in this content panel.
        Parameters:
        sceneX - x coordinate of a scene point
        sceneY - y coordinate of a scene point
        Returns:
        null or the topmost FXOMObject located at (sceneX, sceneY)

      • pick

        public com.oracle.javafx.scenebuilder.kit.fxom.FXOMObject pick(double sceneX,
                                                               double sceneY,
                                                               java.util.Set<com.oracle.javafx.scenebuilder.kit.fxom.FXOMObject> excludes)
        Returns the topmost FXOMObject at (sceneX, sceneY) but ignoring objects from the exclude set.
        Parameters:
        sceneX - x coordinate of a scene point
        sceneY - y coordinate of a scene point
        excludes - null or a set of FXOMObject to be excluded from the pick.
        Returns:
        null or the topmost FXOMObject located at (sceneX, sceneY)

      • pick

        public com.oracle.javafx.scenebuilder.kit.fxom.FXOMObject pick(com.oracle.javafx.scenebuilder.kit.fxom.FXOMObject startObject,
                                                               double sceneX,
                                                               double sceneY,
                                                               java.util.Set<com.oracle.javafx.scenebuilder.kit.fxom.FXOMObject> excludes)
        Returns the topmost FXOMObject at (sceneX, sceneY) but ignoring objects from the exclude set and starting the search from startObject.
        Parameters:
        startObject - starting point of the search
        sceneX - x coordinate of a scene point
        sceneY - y coordinate of a scene point
        excludes - null or a set of FXOMObject to be excluded from the pick.
        Returns:
        null or the topmost FXOMObject located at (sceneX, sceneY)

        Parameters:

        sceneX - x coordinate of a scene point
        sceneY - y coordinate of a scene point
        Returns:
